nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, a female bartender worked at a Junari Point bar on the planet Chandrila. She was present at the establishment in 5 ABY and served beverages to former Imperial loyalty officer Sinjir Rath Velus and two New Republic pilots, "Mister Browscar" and "Miss Scowlface". The bartender had white-blonde hair, which she kept styled in a braid that wrapped her neck like a collar.
The bartender first appeared in Aftermath: Life Debt, a 2016 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
